Content: Fringe worlds should have smaller populations, that distaste central
control, while high population worlds shoudl be more plagued by crime.
The idea is, that the fringe is more of a wild border and people ther
react with revolt to too much central authorithy, while the big worlds
are very loyal once enough police is on the street and the (luxury)
goods keep coming. This should be an emergent behavior of the system,
since big planets have more ressources to invest in a populations
happiness, while small worlds will just not engage in activities
lowering happiness (like taxation or infrastructure planning).
